data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Arusha, Tanzania, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arusha, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Arusha, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 186,198 believers in Arusha and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Arusha who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Hadzabi people. 1.9% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, guide seekers in Arusha, Tanzania to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Arusha who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Arusha.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Arusha
location.cities_list: Arusha, Kingori, Kiratu, Usa River, Mto wa Mbu
